title: Developing a network model of caloric restriction in the mouse
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
findingsText: This work is ongoing. The aim is to integrate large datasets to develop a network model of the impact of caloric restriction. Once the model is developed it will be valuable to evaluate the efficacy of CR mimetic pharmaceuticals Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
